name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Site Reliability Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications. Expert in CI/CD practices and tools such as **GitHub Actions**, **Azure DevOps**, and implementing **Infrastructure as Code** using **Terraform**, **Azure Bicep**, and **ARM Templates**. Proficient in managing **Azure IaaS** and **Azure PaaS** environments, along with **VMware vSphere**. Experienced in **Linux Administration**, **Windows Administration**, and **macOS Administration**, ensuring smooth application performance and reliability. Strong skills in **PowerShell** and **Bash Scripting** for automation and efficiency.

Skilled in building AI/ML-powered platforms supporting predictive analytics, with a focus on robust solutions in compliance with industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I have hands-on experience in MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Committed to mentorship and providing technical leadership to enhance team performance and collaboration.
